analysis.description:
RPTToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/24/0xf1a47b728439730e9f83054d7c352575bf13f0b4.sol#146-147) shadows:
	- ERC20.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/24/0xf1a47b728439730e9f83054d7c352575bf13f0b4.sol#36)

RPTCrowdsale.endCrowdfund (/unique_chucks/24/0xf1a47b728439730e9f83054d7c352575bf13f0b4.sol#297-319) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(remainingTokenHolder,remainingToken) (/unique_chucks/24/0xf1a47b728439730e9f83054d7c352575bf13f0b4.sol#307-309)

Reentrancy in RPTCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/24/0xf1a47b728439730e9f83054d7c352575bf13f0b4.sol#320-341):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,amount) (/unique_chucks/24/0xf1a47b728439730e9f83054d7c352575bf13f0b4.sol#332-340)
	- token.changeTotalSupply(amount) (/unique_chucks/24/0xf1a47b728439730e9f83054d7c352575bf13f0b4.sol#333)
	External calls sending eth:
	- fundTransfer(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/24/0xf1a47b728439730e9f83054d7c352575bf13f0b4.sol#324)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/24/0xf1a47b728439730e9f83054d7c352575bf13f0b4.sol#334-337)
